name: @rein-ai/openclaw-plugin
description: Run Rein multi-agent workflows from OpenClaw

reinPath.description: Path to rein CLI executable (default: searches PATH for 'rein', falls back to 'python -m rein')

agentsDir.description: Path to agents directory containing flows/, specialists/, teams/

gatewayUrl.description: Rein HTTP Gateway URL (e.g. http://your-server:8200). If set, uses HTTP instead of local subprocess

apiKey.description: API key for Rein HTTP Gateway authentication
